content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://easyhowto.co https://api.openweathermap.org https://www.bing.com https://r.bing.com https://geoip-js.com; script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://pro.fontawesome.com https://code.jquery.com https://geoip-js.com data:;  style-src https://www.bing.com https://r.bing.com 'self' https://pro.fontawesome.com; img-src 'self' https://openweathermap.org  * data:;
